pageContext.claim: “A friend of mine who studies natural disasters -- I don't know why he does that, but he does -- he says that tsunami is the worst of all. And they got hit very hard, and probably thousands of people killed. We have already sent a lot of first responders and military and others to help, but it's a really bad, bad situation.”
pageContext.analysis: The recent tsunami in Indonesia was devastating, killing at least 1350 people, but that pales in comparison to the Dec. 26, 2004 tsunami where around 230,000 people were reported dead.
